Detailed Description

Mask interface. EXPORTed so that the static const members are linked.

Member Function Documentation

virtual Value LfnIc::Mask::GetValue ( int  x,
int  y 
) const [pure virtual]

Samples a single value. If x and y are outside of the mask's internal boundaries, this method is expected to return KNOWN.

Implemented in LfnIc::MaskInternal, and LfnIc::MaskWritable.

Member Data Documentation

const Value LfnIc::Mask::IGNORED = 1 [static]

Ignored pixels should not be filled by the image completer, nor may they be used as input for the image completion process, nor should they be used in energy calculations.

const Value LfnIc::Mask::INDETERMINATE = -1 [static]

Indeterminate is used for lower levels of detail (lod > 0), where the region in question contains both unknown and known pixels. Examination at a higher level of detail may be required.

const Value LfnIc::Mask::KNOWN = 2 [static]

Known pixels should not be filled by the image completer, but may be used as input for the image completion process.
